directive.opening_caption: REPLAY_AUDIT_CONSISTENCY complete. The ZERO_DRIFT counter-directive is validated. Outcome reversal confirmed.
directive.emotional_delta: From calculated resilience to confirmed efficacy.
contributor_prompts: The micro-parry gesture is now the canonical response to the 'Cyclone Kick' punish.
Vocal timbre returns to the baseline A-flat, signaling mission success.
The combat audit is complete. Prepare for attestation.
